name: Legion of Super Heroes: Invisible Kid II Trivia Game | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the real name of the second Legionnaire to go by the code name Invisible Kid?
options: Ganglios
Drake Burroughs
Lyle Norg
questions.explanation:
Jacques Foccart.

	Invisible Kid (II) first appeared in 'The Legion of Super Heroes' (vol. 2) Annual #1 in 1982.  He came to the Legion, Brainiac 5 in particular, to seek assistance with a disease she was experiencing.

questions.text: What is the home planet for Invisible Kid (II)?
options: Naltor
Zoon
Trom
questions.explanation:
Earth.

	Jacques grew up with his two sisters on the Ivory Coast of Africa in 31st century Earth.

questions.text: Invisible Kid (II)'s speech is substantially different from his fellow Legionnaires, but in what manner?
questions.correct: He has a heavy French accent
options: He does not speak interlac, and uses a communicator box
He is mute and communicates through sign language
He has a heavy stuttering problem
questions.explanation:
He has a heavy French accent.

	The region of Earth where Jacques grew up was that of the former francophone nation of Côte d'Ivoire.  His speech was peppered with French accent, exclamations and pronunciations.

questions.text: How does the second Invisible Kid gain his super powers?
questions.correct: Consuming the same formula as the original Invisible Kid
options: He is a mutant, born with his abilities
Passing through the tail of a cosmic comet
He created a spectrum machine allows him to bend light and color
questions.explanation:
Consuming the same formula as the original Invisible Kid.

	At Brainiac 5's urging, Jacques drinks a vial of the serum invented by Lyle Norg, the original Invisible Kid.  Jacques assists the Legion in defeating Computo with his new powers and is extended membership.

questions.text: Shortly after joining the Legion, the second Invisible Kid undergoes an alteration to his physical appearance.  What is the alteration?
questions.correct: A strip of his hair turns completely white
options: He develops antennas
He loses 40 lbs and hits his goal weight
He is given a prosthetic right arm
questions.explanation:
A strip of his hair turns completely white.

	Though still a teenager, Jacques had a strip of hair permanently turn solid white from the fright he experienced when first seeing the villain Darkseid.

questions.text: The second Invisible Kid eventually develops a second power, one that that the original Invisible Kid did not have.  What is this second power?
questions.correct: He is a able to teleport from one place to another
options: He is able to generate invisible force fields
He is able to become intangible.
He is able to make other things or people invisible
questions.explanation:
He is a able to teleport from one place to another.

	Unlike his power of invisibility, Jacques is not able to control the power of teleportation.  The power becomes a danger to himself and others.  He seeks out the Legion's top physician, Dr. Gym'll, to have this power removed.

questions.text: In the "5 Year Later" continuity, Invisible Kid (II) is instrumental in leading an underground movement to help overthrow the corrupt Earthgov.  What former group comprises the majority of his "soldiers"?
options: The Wanderers
The Heroes of Lallor
The Legion Academy
questions.explanation:
The Legion of Substitute Heroes.

	Along with former Legionnaire Tyroc, former Substitute Legionnaires working under Jacques leadership include Fire Lad, Stone Boy, Color Kid, Infectious Lass, Chlorophyll Kid, and Porcupine Pete.

questions.text: In the Legion's "Five Year Later" continuity, Invisible Kid (II) begins dating and then marries a fellow heroine.  Who is it?
options: Psyche
Quantum Queen
Gas Girl
questions.explanation:
Infectious Lass.

	Infectious Lass was not only Jacques's partner in life, but his partner in running the underground resistance operations that eventually lead to the reformation of the Legion.

questions.text: Following Invisible Kid (II)'s leadership in exposing and beating the corrupt Earthgov and Dominator influence, he is selected for a new position as Earth begins to rebuild.  What is this position?
options: Head of Earth's new military
Leader of the newly reformed Legion of Super Heroes
Leader of the new anti-Dominator task force
questions.explanation:
President of Earth.

	Jacques is elected as President of Earth, with Tyroc as his Vice President.  Jacques and Drura (Infectious Lass) move into the Presidential mansion.  He eventually steps down to co-lead the Legion, leaving Tyroc as the new President.

questions.text: In the "Post Zero Hour/Reboot" Legion continuity, Invisible Kid (II) does not join the Legion (or use the name Invisible Kid).  What role did he play in this continuity?
questions.correct: Childhood friend of Lyle (Invisible Kid) Norg
options: He is a politician
He is a trainer at the Legion Academy
He works for the Legion's benefactor, RJ Brande
questions.explanation:
Childhood friend of Lyle (Invisible Kid) Norg.

	In this continuity, Lyle was raised by the Foccarts and Jacques was like a brother.  Unlike previous continuity, the white stripe in his hair seems to be something he was born with. He works for Earthgov and received variant invisibility powers from Lyle's serum.
